Summary: On Jekyll Island, Georgia, on August 9th 2013 around 8:30pm I witnessed 2 orangish/white lights hover over ocean then disappear one by one from outside towards center.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Jekyll Island
There were no other sightings in Jekyll Island on or around August 9th 2013
divs: sighting detailson friday, august 9th 2013 , between 8pm and 9pm , (best estimate is 8:30pm as it was right around sunset) my family and i were walking back from the beach to our hotel room on jekyll island , georgia. my nephew's mother stopped me as we were walking and asked what is that in the sky? i glanced up real quick and saw a couple of lights close to eachother& parallel & i said it's a helicopter and kept walking. she then said, "but it's not moving".my mom, her and i then stared up at it. not only was it not moving, lights were not flashing & it made no noise. i saw 2 circular lights hover. they were larger than any star and glowed\pulsed a orangish\white light. one by one the lights dissappeared from the outside towards the center. there may have been a third light that had disappeared because my mom thought she saw 3 at first. it all happened very quick,within 30 seconds or so.
